title: 94/676/EC: Commission Decision of 18 October 1994 concerning the additional financial aid from the Community for the operations of the Community reference laboratory for classical swine fever (Hanover Veterinary School, Hanover, Germany)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 October 1994 concerning the additional financial aid from the Community for the operations of the Community reference laboratory for classical swine fever (Hanover Veterinary School, Hanover, Germany) (94/676/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Community shall provide additional financial assistance to the Community reference laboratory for classical swine fever up to a maximum of ECU 130 000.

1. To meet the objectives of Article 1, the contract provided for in Decision 93/667/EC shall be extended for a period of one year.
2. The Director-General of Directorate-General for Agriculture shall be authorized to sign the addendum to the contract on behalf of the Commission of the European Communities.
3. The financial aid provided for in Article 1 shall be paid to the reference laboratory in accordance with the terms of the contract provided for in Decision 93/667/EC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 October 1994.
